Text 5.original: That it is an important aspect for the parents because they think their children using all the time their phone because their spend a lot of time in the social media and this distract them to make others things like read or playing with friends.
Normally, we use the social Media to spend our time, but this is not allway the case.

When people use TikTok can see a lot of videos about news in other parts of the world, also you can discober a new place to visit or show new things that you never saw for example, last summer I went to London and thanks to a video I saw on Instagram, I can went to a specific place so that there are not so many people.

Although it is not al good, because some times the childrens don't know when stop watching videos on the phone, as it is very addictive They lose time to read a book or study, this causes children to lose the ability to concentrate.
When they have exams they are not able to study and the students go to the exams without knowing anything.
This it is a big problem of the performance of the childrens.
To conclude, the social media have a big impact in our society.
If you know how to use, they are a good suport to know a lot of new things, but if you don't know how to spend the right time can be dangerous.
Thank for read this blof post, I hope it has helped.
